Description.Text: Situated on the Las Ramblas, Barcelona town centre is just 100 m from the hotel and the Sagrada Familia is 3.4 km away. Barcelona's city beach is just 600 metres from the hotel, while Playa la Barceloneta beach is around 2.1 km away. Other nearby places of interest include the cathedral (800 metres), Placa Catalunya (950 metres) and Mercat de la Boqueria (400 metres). Barcelona-El Prat de Llobregat airport is approximately 10 km from the hotel and Reus airport is around 90 km away.

Each apartment features an en suite bathroom with shower, bathtub and hairdryer, a double or king-size bed, a kitchen with fridge, cooker, microwave and tea and coffee making facilities, some with private balcony or terrace. Other in-room amenities include a TV, Internet access, an ironing set and individually regulated air conditioning and heating.

Built in 1865 and newly renovated in 2011, this charming apartment hotel offers 15 fully equipped and comfortable rooms with the modern services and amenities that guests have come to expect. It also features a lobby area with lift access to the apartments, and wireless Internet access is available in the hotel.
